ibis.io
Class DataOutputStreamSplitter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      ibis.io.DataOutputStream
          ibis.io.DataOutputStreamSplitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataOutput, Closeable, Flushable
public final class DataOutputStreamSplitter
extends DataOutputStream

Contract: write to multiple outputstreams. when an exception occurs, store it and continue. when the data is written to all streams, throw one large exception that contains all previous exceptions. This way, even when one of the streams dies, the rest will receive the data.

bytesWritten

public long bytesWritten()
Description copied from class: DataOutputStream
Returns the number of bytes that was written to the stream, in the stream dependant format. This is the number of bytes that will be sent over the network.

Specified by:
